page.title: 10SOCIAL SERVICES
page.content: Many Social Services are provided by the ladies of the Women's Royal Voluntary Service.These include Meals on Wheels to the elderly or icapacitated,a hospital trolley service providing soft drinks,sweets and fruit for patients,and helping to run a Senior Citizens' Club. AGE CONCERN does much good work which is greatly appreciated. The Hospital Day Care Centre enables elderly patients to have a bath,visit the chiropodist and meet friends. A Sheltered Housing complex is provided for the elderly and infirm with nursing staff in charge.
